casebody.data:
KLINE BROS. & CO. v. LONDON & LANCASHIRE INS. CO. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. May 8, 1917.) No. 237. In Error to the District Court of the United States for the Southern District of New York. Erwin, Fried & Czaki, of Now York City, for plaintiffs in error. Hartwell Oahell, of New York City, for defendant in error.

Before COXE, WARD, and IlOUGII, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Submitted without argument. Judgment affirmed.
